verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) The <S%H776>earth<s%> is the Lord's, and <S%H4393>all<s%> it <S%H4393>contains,<s%> The <S%H8398>world,<s%> and those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it.
For He has <S%H3245>founded<s%> it upon the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> And <S%H3559>established<s%> it upon the <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> may <S%H5927>ascend<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? And <S%H4310>who<s%> may <S%H6965>stand<s%> in His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>?

He who has <S%H9345>clean<s%> <S%H3709>hands<s%> and a <S%H1249>pure<s%> <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H834>Who<s%> has not <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H7723>falsehood,<s%> And has not <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully.<s%>
He shall <S%H5375>receive<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> And <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> from the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of those who <S%H1875>seek<s%> Him, Who <S%H1245>seek<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> â€“ [even] <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H5375>Lift<s%> up your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> O <S%H8179>gates,<s%> And be <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up, O <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H6607>doors,<s%> That the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H9202>glory<s%> may <S%H935>come<s%> in!
<S%H4310>Who<s%> is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H9202>glory<s%>? The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5808>strong<s%> and <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

<S%H5375>Lift<s%> up your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> O <S%H8179>gates,<s%> And <S%H5375>lift<s%> [them] up, O <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H6607>doors,<s%> That the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H9202>glory<s%> may <S%H935>come<s%> in!
<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H9202>glory<s%>? The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> He is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H9202>glory.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
